Episodes.Title: Ear-Sy Rider
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: While a biker gang begins hanging out at the restaurant, Louise goes through a crisis after a teenager steals her bunny ear hat.

Episodes.Title: Full Bars
Episodes.Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: On Halloween, the kids run into bullies when they go trick-or-treating in the rich neighborhood, while Bob and Linda attend a party where someone kills Teddy's pet guinea pig.

Episodes.Title: Bob Fires the Kids
Episodes.Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Fearing that he is ruining their childhoods, Bob fires the kids from their jobs at the restaurant, but they just end up working for hippies who run a marijuana farm, instead.

Episodes.Title: Mutiny on the Windbreaker
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Kit Boss
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob brings the family along when he is hired to be a chef on a docked cruise ship, so they can see his skills outside the restaurant.

Episodes.Title: An Indecent Thanksgiving Proposal
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lizzie Molyneux-Logelin
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: In order to entice an old flame who is only attracted to married men, Mr. Fischoeder bribes Bob into letting him pass off Linda and the kids as his own family, but the situation ruins all of Bob's Thanksgiving traditions.

Episodes.Title: The Deepening
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Mr. Fischoeder buys a mechanical movie shark as an attraction for his amusement park, but the kids accidentally let it loose on the town, forcing Bob and Teddy to save the day.

Episodes.Title: Tina-Rannosaurus Wrecks
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina is wracked with guilt when Bob forces her to lie about an accident that occurred when he let her drive his car, but a shady insurance adjuster sees through their ploy and blackmails Bob into committing more insurance fraud.

Episodes.Title: The Unbearable Like-Likeness of Gene
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: An incredibly annoying girl develops a crush on Gene, but he can't bring himself to dump her after he finds out her father has a music studio in their home.

Episodes.Title: Bob Rest Ye Merry Gentle-Mannequins
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Kit Boss
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: 'Tis the season for strange holiday mannequins.

Episodes.Title: Mother Daughter Laser Razor
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Linda struggles to connect with Louise when they attend a mother-daughter seminar, while Bob takes Tina to get her legs waxed.

Episodes.Title: Nude Beach
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: It's dingles and dongles and birthday suits.

Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Tina is on a mission to unmask the middle school and Gene decides to dress up like Bob
